ygData.subject: Re: Skill Cap
ygData.msgSnippet: Hide is capped at 35!?  Sheesh, and I find it rather useless at 50! Roop
ygData.messageBody:
Hide is capped at 35!? Sheesh, and I find it rather useless at 50!

Roop


>From: "J.M. Capozzi" <croak63@...>
>
>That's assuming a maximum ability allowed in a skill.
>
>Bards are capped in the following skills, all at 5 per level, excluding
>trade skills:
>
>Offense:200
>Defense:200
>1h Slash: 200
>1h Blunt:200
>Pierce: 200
>Dual Wield:200
>Dodge:125
>Hide:35 (wood elves get inate 50 in this)
>Sneak:75
>Forage:40(wood elves get inate 50 in this)
>Safe Fall:40
>Tracking:35
>Disarm Traps:40
>Pick Locks:40
>Sense Heading:200
>Instruments:200
>Singing:200
>Languages:200
>Trade Skills:200
>
>----- Original Message -----
>From: Fun Bob <fun-bob@...>
>To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Sent: Friday, May 14, 1999 7:25 PM
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Skill Cap
>
>
>>From: "Fun Bob" <fun-bob@...>
>>
>>Just to get everyone clear on the subject, your skill cap is
>>5 Times your Level, +5
>>So, say your 10th level, your skill cap will be 55
>>10*5=50+5=55
>>Rolande, drunken Bard of Povar
>>
>>
